thread.title: Sydney ranked the friendliest city for tourists by travel magazine
thread.title_full: Sydney ranked the friendliest city for tourists by travel magazine

author: Deccan
title: Sydney ranked the friendliest city for tourists by travel magazine
text:
Deccan Chronicle | September 02, 2015, 19.55 pm The Opera House in Sydney. (Picture Courtesy: File photo) The next time you want to visit a place that not just looks good but also has friendly locals to help you out then go for Sydney. The Australian city has been ranked by travel magazine Conde Nast as the friendliest city for tourists.
Its Australian counterpart Melbourne won the title last year, with Sydney in the fifth place. But obviously, Sydney folks have gotten a lot better from last year! Dublin bagged the second place in the list.
However, the magazine also released the list of the least friendly cities in the world. The Venezuelan city of Caracas got that title. Unfortunately the Indian capital city of New Delhi came in the sixth place in the list.
 Sydney New Delhi Caracas friendliest city unfriendliest city Also Read The Alchemy of Desire, Mr Tejpal? Anti-Sikh riots: SC tells Sajjan Kumar to face murder charges Delhi Metro gets first driver-less train Sikh protesters block Jammu-Pathankot National Highway
